entry.title: $2650 // Redone one bedroom in absolutely amazing area, blocks from barclays!
entry.content:
GORGEOUS NEW ONE BEDROOM APARTMENT IN A STUNNING BUILDING IN THE HOTTEST PART OF FORTE GREEN

***HEAT AND HOT WATER INCLUDED***

Amenities:

HUGE BEDROOM
Large SPACIOUS Living Room Space
GORGEOUS open kitchen with GRANITE counter tops
Stainless Steal Appliances Including a DISHWASHER
Modern tiled bathroom
Hardwood floor throughout the apartment

This is a corner building with a wonderful natural light throughout, laundry on site.

Right next to restaurants, shops, grocery stores, bars and much more!

Minutes from the 2,3,4,5,A,B,C,D,G,N,Q and R trains: a ride to Manhattan in minutes!

***PETS ALLOWED***

***GUARANTORS WELCOME***

Call, text or email Joseph: show contact info
